        static Scope of(Configuration configuration)

      • settings

        Settings settings()
        Gets the current settings of this scope.

        The scope is initialized with its settings upon creation and will read them from a config file. The settings can be modified by any service during the lifetime of the scope.

        Returns:
        the current scope settings

      • configuration

        Configuration configuration()
        The current configuration of this scope.

        The configuration is never null but may change during the lifetime of the scope. Directly access the configuration from the scope when you need it and do not cache it in a variable.

        The configuration may change when the scope is being bootstrapped, but should stay the same after bootstrapping has finished.

        Returns:
        the current configuration of this scope

      • store

        default StorageProvider store()
        Gets the storage provider of this scope.

        Use the StorageProvider to store persistent data for your module or targets.

        This is just a shortcut to #configuration()#store().

        Returns:
        the storage provider
        See Also:
        StorageProvider

      • load

        ArtContext load(java.util.List<java.lang.String> list)
